tiles.headerDebrisRemoval: SPAICE is a solution for sustainability in space
tiles.paragraphDebrisRemoval: Relying on the latest advancements in AI to enable autonomous debris removal and satellite life extension

products.poseEstimationHeader: Deep Learning based perception algorithms to accurately estimate the position and track the target
products.poseEstimationDescription: Suitable for cooperative and non-cooperative targets
products.navigationHeader: Exploit cutting-edge motion planning technologies to consciously navigate towards the goal
products.navigationDescription: Integrating orbital dynamics to achieve the optimal path
products.dockingHeader: Our trained policies offer the best control strategy for multi-purpose docking
products.dockingDescription: A precise docking enables several ad-hoc services
products.onBoardHeader: Intelligent robotic manipulation solutions for on-satellite operations and debris removal
products.onBoardDescription: We extend the lifespan of satellites by performing maintenance operations

cta.header: The beginning of a new in-orbit servicing era
cta.paragraph: We are looking for partners to join us in this journey

testimonial.header: Autonomous navigation for space is lifting off

team.matteoBackground: Aerospace Engineer specialised in AI and ML, with a track record of experiences in fast-paced industries.
team.guillemBackground: Electronics & Computer Science Engineer, specialised in AI and ML, doctorating in Robotic manipulation.
team.nicholasBackground: Aerospace Engineer specialised in Robotics, experienced in big tech companies.
team.carlotaBackground: Computer Scientist, specialised in Robot Learning and AI, with extensive experience in world-leading labs and big tech companies.
team.ronaldBackground: Associate Professor at the University of Oxford, Computer Vision researcher with strong background in 3D Computer Vision and Computer Graphics.

values.header: The potential of SPAICE enables endless applications
values.paragraph: This represents our unique value proposition
values.teamHeader: SPAICE is powered by engineers from the best universities in Europe

businessTechVision.businessParagraph: Autonomously identifying, approaching,  and docking in-space targets  to extend satellites' life  and remove orbiting debris
businessTechVision.technologyParagraph: AI-based end-to-end pipeline  for autonomous navigation in space, deploying the power of latest software advancements
businessTechVision.visionParagraph: Impacting space navigation  empowering the market expansion towards a more reliable and sustainable circular space enconomy

news1.title: SPAICE awarded at T-Tec 2022
news1.description: SPAICE's innovative technology has been awarded at T-Tec 2022 in the context of the European Space Conference in Brussels.
